articles.title: Asian Games Live Updates Day 2: Historic gold for India in cricket and shooting - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Live Updates: In the men's 10m air rifle team event, the Indian contingent set a new world record and bagged gold in Hangzhou.

articles.title: Asian Games: Aishwary Tomar wins bronze - but it could mean more to him than all his golds - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Given his form, Aishwary could well end the Games with the most medals among Indian athletes.
